title: Installed Insulting Plaques Beneath Presidential Portraits - 'Presidential Walk of Fame'
summary: December 2025: Trump installed bronze plaques beneath presidential portraits along the White House West Wing Colonnade in what he calls the 'Presidential Walk of Fame.' Many plaques, reportedly written by Trump himself, contain insults and baseless claims about his predecessors. Biden's plaque calls him 'Sleepy Joe Biden' and 'the worst President in American History' - his portrait was replaced with a photo of an autopen device. Obama's plaque calls him 'one of the most divisive political figures in American History' despite having highest retrospective favorability (59%) of past five presidents. Written in Trump's social media style with random capitalization and insults. Sparked controversy over presidential decorum and use of White House for partisan attacks.
